org.iu.gps
Class DATUM

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.iu.gps.DATUM
public class DATUM
extends java.lang.Object

DATUM specifies a geodetic earth datum, that is, an ellipsoid whose center is moved from the center.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Uli Walther
